title: Did 30,000 Scientists Declare Climate Change a Hoax?
subtitle: More than 30,000 people may have signed a petition challenging the veracity of anthropogenic global warming, but one doesn’t have to be a climate scientist, or even a practicing scientist, to sign that document.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: 30,000 scientists have signed a petition arguing that there is no convincing scientific evidence for anthropogenic climate change.
